channel.title: How to put objects into my New Home?
channel.description: Hey Moparscape players, i just need some help on how to put new Bank booths, and stalls into my new Home. Any help?

item.title: How to put objects into my New Home?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Here is the method you edit:

    public void NewObjects() {

Here is your key:

    public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType) {

Here is an example:

        makeGlobalObject(3042, 4843, 2781, 0, 10);// Furnace

I would help you further but I am going to sleep. Good luck.

Read full topic
item.source: How to put objects into my New Home?
